exceptions.exn: In environment T : cpo s : Pred (T * T) Hbot : bot \\In s Hlim : forall d : chain (pairCPO T T), d <=p s -> lim d \\In s d : chain T Hd : d <=p [Pred t | (t, t) \\In s] Unable to unify "(let 'MemProp p := Mem s in [eta p]) (lim ?M1473)" with "(let 'MemProp p := Mem [Pred t | (t, t) \\In s] in [eta p]) (lim d)".

original: rewrite /chain_closed. move=> [Hbot Hlim]. split. - apply: Hbot. - move=> d Hd. apply Hlim. move=> p Hp. apply: Hd. exact: Hp.
